Detailed Description

SPI bus access functions.

Date:
2007-Dez-11
Author:
B. Jozefini, S. Radtke (C) 2007 Nanotron Technologies
Note:
BuildNumber = "BuildNumber : 7951";

This file contains the prototypes for the SPI bus control functions of the AVR controller.
